Source.Name: marp-cli
Source.Summary: A CLI interface for Marp and Marpit based converters
Source.Description: A CLI interface for Marp and any slide deck converter based on Marpit framework. It can convert Marp / Marpit Markdown files into static HTML / CSS, PDF, PowerPoint document, and image(s) easily.
